package.description: WxMpl is a library of wxPython widgets which provide interactive plotting capabilities via the matplotlib 2D plotting library. Although matplotlib excels at generating a variety of publication quality figures, its wxPython widgetry compares poorly with BLT's interactive features. WxMpl aims to remedy this situation by providing out-of-the-box support for basic user interactions while supporting as many of matplotlib's figures and features as possible.
package.author: Ken McIvor
